fair.title: Fair Play Check
fair.hash: The hash of the round is generated by the formula:
fair.youCan: You can substitute the data and check the hash up on

p.1: Before the start of each game, a salt (32 random symbols) and a number will be randomly generated to end the game.
p.2: They are added together and hashed with sha256, after which this hash is displayed before the game starts.
p.3: At the end of the game, you can see the salt with which the generation was made, and make sure that the hash has not changed and everything matches.
p.4:
This all means that we can't influence the outcome of the
game in advance or during the game itself.
